definition: To have the authorization or permission to engage in a particular action, often used to express permissibility or allowance.

examples.english: Am I allowed to open the window?

examples.german: Du darfst nicht so viel Süßigkeiten essen.
examples.english: You must not eat so many sweets.

examples.german: Er darf heute nicht ins Kino gehen.
examples.english: He is not allowed to go to the cinema today.

examples.german: Wir dürfen den Zug nicht verpassen.
examples.english: We must not miss the train.
